data.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.model.IdentifiableItem
      • data.model.BaseItem
        • data.model.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenesisGame, MameGame, SnesGame, SteamGame

    public abstract class Game
extends BaseItem
    Represents a game that can be run from the Arcadoid front-end.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops the game process and return to Arcadoid front-end. Most games can be terminated by just destroying the associated emulator process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
